author: sweeneygirl_10
title: Great hotel - Review
text: I stated at the Cambria march 12-15. Staff was great rooms are clean,quiet at night to sleep. Lots of restaurants near even a Sephora around the corner . Easy walk to time square and to the Empire State Building and flat iron district, Bryant part isn't to far as well.. we had issues with the heat until we realized that big thing by the window is wear you control the heat.. we used Ã¼ber from Newark airport for about $30.
